English: I see... Renamon's always been like that.
Chinese:
竟然發生了這樣的事……
妖狐獸真是一點都沒變。
Korean:
그런 일이 있었구나~……
레나몬은 늘 그런다니까
German: Ich verstehe ... Renamon war schon immer so.

English: Thanks for helping her. I'll send payment later!
Chinese:
謝謝你救了妖狐獸！
我會好好地把報酬送過去的！
Korean:
레나몬을 구해줘서 고마워!
보수는 제대로 보내줄게!
German:
Danke, dass du ihm geholfen hast. Ich schicke
dir später dein Honorar!

English: Huh? What was she doing there in the first place?
Chinese: 咦？　到最後還是不知道為何妖狐獸會在那個地方？
Korean:
응? 결국 레나몬이 왜
그곳에 있었는지 몰랐다고?
German: Was? Was es hier überhaupt gemacht hat?

English:
The thing about Renamon is, she's really kind and
can't possibly ignore a child in trouble.
Chinese:
妖狐獸他啊，　
是個看到小孩子身處危險時，
無法置之不理的善良數碼寶貝。
Korean:
레나몬은 말이지,
아이가 위험한 일을 당하는 걸 내버려 둘 수 없는
착한 디지몬이야
German:
Renamon ist so hilfsbereit, dass es kein Kind
ignorieren kann, das in der Patsche steckt.

English:
As soon as she heard that a girl went missing in
Asakusa, she rushed to the scene.
Chinese:
所以當他聽說有女孩在淺草失蹤時，
他就感到坐立難安。
Korean:
그래서, 아사쿠사에서 여자애가 행방불명됐다고 듣고서
가만히 있을 수 없었던 거야
German:
Sobald es hörte, dass in Asakusa ein Mädchen
verschwunden war, kam es herbeigeeilt.

English:
She doesn't even consider her own safety. That's
why I was so worried about her.
Chinese:
正因為他是如此善良的數碼寶貝，
我才會擔心他，而委託了你。
Korean:
그런 착한 디지몬이니까
걱정이 되어서 내가 의뢰했던 거야
German:
Dabei ist ihm seine eigene Sicherheit völlig egal.
Darum habe ich mir solche Sorgen um es gemacht.

English:
I can't believe she actually offered to help you,
though...
Chinese:
話說回來，沒想到那個妖狐獸
竟然自己說想助你一臂之力……
Korean:
그건 그렇고 그 레나몬이
나서서 힘을 빌려주고 싶다고 말하다니~……
German:
Aber ich kann nicht glauben, dass es angeboten
hat, dir zu helfen.

English: She doesn't trust hackers. I'm amazed.
Chinese:
妖狐獸很不信任駭客的。
所以他可是很難得會說出這種話的喔？
Korean:
레나몬은 해커를 신용하지 않으니까
그런 말을 하는 건 참 드문 일이야
German: Es vertraut keinen Hackern. Ich bin erstaunt.

English: She must have really taken a liking to you.
Chinese: 看樣子他似乎很喜歡你。
German: Es scheint dich wirklich zu mögen.

English: Let her know if you ever need her.
Chinese:
如果有什麼困擾的話，
務必去拜託妖狐獸喔。
Korean:
뭔가 곤란한 일이 생기면
꼭 레나몬에게 부탁해줘
German: Sag ihm Bescheid, wenn du je seine Hilfe brauchst.

English: I'm sure she'll be happy to help!
Chinese: 這樣的話妖狐獸也會很開心的！
German: Ich bin sicher, dass es dir gern helfen wird!

Chinese: 那麼，這次真的謝謝你了！
